marklogic.body: I am Glad that she died. She belongs in a better place than this evil Cold hearted world where everyone is separate-looking down at others as inferior according to how much money or what social class they are in-well it is the rich and powerful who have gotten that way by the evil they do for satan-the whole money system is satanic-the religion of satan is separation into classes of wealth and poverty-better and lower-in inequity. In God we are all one-loving one another as equals. Good people do not can not do the things that make one rich-God keeps his lambs poor and pure of heart-souls intact. He is taking many to heaven and at the same time the killers of his lambs are doing the evil killing-that will end them in eternal Hell and damnation-separated from God forever-and placed in Satans's place for those who have great pride in what a sytsem of inequity gives them-false pride-as superior scum.
